title: Who are Timothy and Emily? AHS Apocalypse Fan Theories
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: What about Emily being Lee‘s first daughter in Roanoke?
You know it would be so AHS for Tim and Emily to be NO ONE. Yes they will be special but for NO reason. Sometimes those who are special are from the most unextraordinary back grounds.

Okay Mary... we have some tea. 🕯🕯So something just isn’t right. In Hotel, we see that everything is perfectly fine as of October 30th 2022 ... the outside is fine, the people are fine, no possible trace of the apocalypse even though this season does run through that timeline. The only possible explanation is that the apocalypse is a hoax and the surrounding area is made to look like a wasteland OR the witches reverse the disaster. Who knows; I would love to hear anyone’s opinion.
Have you seen the theory that Emily might be the same Emily mentioned by Lee in Roanoke ?
All I know is both of their characters are as dull as a box of hair. 😑
